name: Gender Bender
description: Hate it when video games force you to identify as gender binary? Want some more options? Want the gender universe brought to life? Watch the genders fresh off of tumblr battle it out in the newest action-fighter of the season. *Not all genders implemented.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 140 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: N/A
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: N/A DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 140 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: N/A
